name: Twit Twho!
description:
Pre-alpha build!

Three birds, one song - who was the singer???

Bird song eco-education game/app that I'm making, primarily for my own learning!

I was inspired to make this by a visit to Knepp Wildland. I went on an early morning dawn chorus walk and was amazed by what I heard and humbled by my own ignorance, so decided that I wanted to help myself recognise these wonderful animals.

****

Credits:

All audio from RSPB's Bird Song Identifier:

https://www.rspb.org.uk/birds-and-wildlife/bird-songs/what-bird-is-that/

...which are by Patrik Aberg, distributed through Xeno-Canto:
